revised_title: The Role of ADP in Arterial Hemostasis
tldr: This article investigates the role of adenosine diphosphate (ADP) in arterial hemostasis. The authors found that infusing ADP-releasing enzymes or ADP-receptor antagonists into the blood significantly increased bleeding times in rats, suggesting that ADP plays a crucial role in the process of hemostasis by accelerating platelet aggregation.
